input_query:
You plan to visit 5 European cities for 19 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You would like to visit Zurich for 6 days. During day 7 and day 12, you have to attend a conference in Zurich. You want to spend 4 days in Athens. You want to spend 7 days in Dubrovnik. You plan to stay in Stuttgart for 4 days. You plan to stay in Manchester for 2 days. You would like to meet your friends at Manchester between day 18 and day 19 to tour together.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Athens and Manchester, Stuttgart and Athens, Athens and Zurich, Zurich and Dubrovnik, Stuttgart and Manchester, Dubrovnik and Manchester, Athens and Dubrovnik, Zurich and Manchester.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 19 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
